The text file you choose must have a key structure and a value in the form (key: value) and separated by a new Line
"
" For example "	":
"

What is Leitner? 
 
One of the best strategies for memorizing words and phrases is following Leitner system principles. "\Dileit"\ is here to helps you memorizing "\Dictionary words"\ and "\Customised items"\ in order to Leitner principles. 

 How does it work?

 Each time you adding a new card in Leitner Box, it will found in the "\New"\ section. In fact, in this section, There are cards which you have never reviewed. 
 
 When cards of this section reviewed, they will move to "\Review"\ section, while you are reviewing this section, if you don't know the answer of card it will place in "\Box1"\ and if you know the answer of card it will place in "\Box2"\. 

while reviewing cards, in each "\Box"\, if you know the answer of card it will move to the next box and if you don't know the answer, it will back to "\Box1"\. 
 
In the time of reviewing if you know the answer to "\Box5"\ it will move to the next section called "\Learned"\. It means you learned that card. 
You should review each " ox"\ in a specific time which "\Dileit"\ handles it for you: 
 
Box1: every day 
Box2: every 2 days 
Box3: every 4 days 
Box4: every 9 days 
Box5: every 14 days
This group has already been created
Group name must not be empty
The group name must not contain a single quotation mark
Can not To Add This Group
By activating this option, you must reply to the cards at the specified time
This chart shows the percentage of your progress in learning the cards. Click to see more details
Are you sure you want to delete all files?
Are you sure you want to delete all Cards?
You will no longer have access to this information, so it is best to export your files
Its time to review the cards. Review the cards to reach the goal
Whenever the cards are reviewed, a notification containing the following message will be sent to you at the specified time.
Your text file with the following name will be saved in the selected location
The text file with the group name is created in the following path, which contains the text on the card
This way you can create different groups for organization the cards .For example you can put 504 word cards in 504 group and math cards in math group and then review separately.
